sections.number: 73.40.010 - Memorial honoring state residents who died or ar
sections.text:
RCW 73.40.010

Memorial honoring state residents who died or are missing-in-action in southeast Asia.

The secretary of state shall coordinate the design, construction, and placement of a memorial within the state capitol building honoring Washington state residents who died or are "missing-in-action" in the southeast Asia theater of operations.

The secretary of state shall coordinate the design, construction, and placement of a memorial within the state capitol building honoring Washington state residents who died or are "missing-in-action" in the southeast Asia theater of operations.

[ 1984 c 81 s 1. Formerly RCW 40.14.200.]

sections.number: 73.40.030 - Memorial honoring state residents who died or ar
sections.text:
RCW 73.40.030

Memorial honoring state residents who died or are missing-in-action in southeast Asiaâ€”Display of individual names.

The memorial authorized by *RCW 40.14.200 through 40.14.210 shall display the individual names of the Washington state residents who died or are "missing-in-action" in the southeast Asia theater of operations.

The memorial authorized by *RCW 40.14.200 through 40.14.210 shall display the individual names of the Washington state residents who died or are "missing-in-action" in the southeast Asia theater of operations.

[ 1984 c 81 s 3. Formerly RCW 40.14.210.]

*Reviser's note: RCW 40.14.200 through 40.14.210 were recodified as RCW 73.40.010 through 73.40.030.

*Reviser's note: RCW 40.14.200 through 40.14.210 were recodified as RCW 73.40.010 through 73.40.030.

sections.number: 73.40.040 - Memorial honoring state residents who died or ar
sections.text:
RCW 73.40.040

Memorial honoring state residents who died or are missing-in-action in the Korean conflict.

The director of the department of veterans affairs shall coordinate the design, construction, and placement of a memorial within the state capitol grounds honoring Washington state residents who died or are "missing-in-action" in the Korean conflict.

The director of the department of veterans affairs shall coordinate the design, construction, and placement of a memorial within the state capitol grounds honoring Washington state residents who died or are "missing-in-action" in the Korean conflict.

[ 1989 c 235 s 1. Formerly RCW 40.14.220.]
